content: Hello! Thanks for contacting XYZ Home Services. I can help you schedule an appointment for HVAC, plumbing, or electrical work. Can I have your name to get started?
Thank you, Frank! Could you please provide the address where you need the HVAC service?
Got it, thanks! Can you tell me a bit about your HVAC issue? For example, is your system not cooling, strange noises, or something else?
AC is blowing warm air. It's not cooling at all.

Thanks for letting me know, Frank. That sounds frustrating, especially with the weather getting warmer. When would you ideally like a technician to come take a look? We offer both same-day and next-day appointments, depending on availability.
Today if possible. It's very uncomfortable.
Understood, let me check for the earliest available HVAC technician for today.
Good news, Frank! We have an opening between 3pm and 5pm today. Does that work for you?
That works. What will this cost me?
A standard diagnostic visit for HVAC issues costs $79. If repairs are needed, we’ll provide a detailed quote before starting work. Would you like to confirm the 3–5pm appointment?
Yes, go ahead and book it.

You're all set, Frank! Our HVAC technician will arrive between 3pm and 5pm today at 821 Lakewood Drive, Annandale. We'll send you a reminder before the visit. If you have any questions, reply to this number. Thank you for choosing XYZ Home Services!
